file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

servers:
  - url: 'https://api.haskoin.com/bch/'
  - url: 'https://api.haskoin.com/btc/'
  - url: 'https://api.haskoin.com/bchtest/'
  - url: 'https://api.haskoin.com/btctest/'

info:
  version: &version 0.65.2
  title: Haskoin Store
  contact:
    name: Haskoin
    url: https://github.com/haskoin
    email: jprupp@protonmail.ch
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://github.com/haskoin/haskoin-store/blob/master/store/LICENSE
  description: |
    Rich and fast API to query indexed block chain data for Bitcoin and Bitcoin
    Cash.

    Ð¡Ð»Ð°Ð²Ð° Ð£ÐºÑ€Ð°Ñ—Ð½Ñ–! ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦

tags:
  - name: Address
    description: Operations on addresses and extended public keys.
  - name: Transaction
    description: Operations related to transactions.
  - name: Block
    description: Operations related to blocks.
  - name: Network
    description: Network statistics and other miscelaneous operations.
  - name: Slow
    description: Operations not considered scalable. May be disabled.
  - name: Blockchain
    description: Blockchain.info compatibility. May be disabled.

paths:
  '/health':
    get:
      tags:
        - Network
      summary: Health Check
      operationId: healthCheck
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/prettyParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthCheck'
              example:
                ok: true
                net: bch
                blocks:
                  ok: true
                  max: 2
                  blocks: 688794
                  diff: 0
                  headers: 688794
                pending-txs:
                  ok: true
                  max: 100
                  count: 0
                version: 0.52.14
                last-tx:
                  ok: true
                  max: 300
                  age: 0
                last-block:
                  ok: true
                  max: 7200
                  age: 3279
                peers:
                  ok: true
                  count: 20
                  min: 1
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '503':
          description: unavailable
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthCheck'
              example:
                ok: false
                net: bch
                blocks:
                  ok: false
                  max: 2
                  blocks: 688794
                  diff: 4
                  headers: 688798
                pending-txs:
                  ok: true
                  max: 100
                  count: 0
                version: 0.52.14
                last-tx:
                  ok: true
                  max: 300
                  age: 0
                last-block:
                  ok: true
                  max: 7200
                  age: 3279
                peers:
                  ok: false
                  count: 20
                  min: 0
                
  '/address/{address}/transactions':
    get:
      tags:
        - Address
      summary: Transactions for Address
      operationId: getAddressTxs
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/addressParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/heightParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/offsetParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/limitParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/prettyParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Transaction list starting with most recent.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/TxRef'
              example:
                - txid: 00f304a6089a708168cd10d5ad8abd2977c36791156a55b040117cb5a3db7fad
                  block:
                    height: 688793
                    position: 3
                - txid: b810589c80335083ed715c03abf62f23968846d2f54343bac305f890f292ec8e
                  block:
                    height: 688707
                    position: 786

              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '404':
          description: Invalid address.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'

              schema:

          description: |

            * No network peers available.
            * Timeout while publishing, most likely silent rejection.
            * Network peer disconnected while publishing transaction.

            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'

  '/xpub/{xpub}':
    get:
      tags:
        - Address
        - Slow
      operationId: getXPubSummary
      summary: Extended Public Key Summary
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/xpubParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/xpubDerive'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/nocacheParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/prettyParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Information about extended public key.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/XPubSummary'
              example:
                balance:
                  confirmed: 84994
                  unconfirmed: 0
                  received: 137003577
                  utxo: 3
                indices:
                  change: 27
                  external: 73
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '404':
          description: Invalid extended public key.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    delete:
      tags:
        - Address
        - Slow
      operationId: deleteCachedXPub
      summary: Delete Cached Extended Key
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/xpubParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/xpubDerive'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/nocacheParam'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: True if xpub got deleted from cache.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - result
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: boolean
                    nullable: false
                    example: true
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '404':
          description: Invalid argument.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'

  '/blockchain/block-height/{height}':
    get:
      tags:
        - Blockchain
      operationId: getBinfoBlockHeight
      summary: Blocks at Height
      parameters:
        - name: height
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            example: 100
      responses:
        '200':
          description: List of blocks with transaction data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:

                properties:

                  - sequence: 4294967295

        '404':

              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    

components:
  schemas:
  
    BlockRef:
      oneOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Block'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Mempool'

    Block:
      type: object
      required:
        - height
        - position
      properties:
        height:
          description: Block height.
          type: integer
        position:
          description: Position of transaction within block.
          type: integer

    Mempool:
      type: object
      required:
        - mempool
      properties:
        mempool:
          description: Time when transaction was accepted in local mempool.
          type: integer
          format: int64

    XPubBalance:
      type: object
      required:
        - path
        - balance
      properties:
        path:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/XPubPath'
        balance:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Balance'

    XPubPath:
      type: array
      description: Extended public key derivation path for an address.
      items:
        type: integer

    XPubUnspent:
      type: object
      required:
        - path
        - unspent
      properties:
        path:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/XPubPath'
        unspent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Unspent'

    XPubSummary:
      type: object
      required:
        - balance
        - indices
      properties:
        balance:
          type: object
          description: Aggregate balance for all addresses in extended public key.
          required:
            - confirmed
            - unconfirmed
            - received
            - utxo
          properties:
            confirmed:
              description: Confirmed balance for all addresses.
              type: integer
            unconfirmed:
              description: Unconfirmed balance for all addresses.
              type: integer
            received:
              description: Total received on all external addresses.
              type: integer
            utxo:
              description: Unspent transaction output count.
              type: integer
        indices:
          type: object
          description: >-
            Highest derivation indices used on extended public key.
            See: [BIP-44](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki)
          required:
            - external
            - change
          properties:
            external:
              type: integer
            change:
              type: integer

    TxRef:
      type: object
      description: Transaction hash and blockchain position or mempool timestamp.
      required:
        - block
        - txid
      properties:
        block:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlockRef'
        txid:
          type: string

    Balance:
      type: object
      required:
        - address
        - confirmed
        - unconfirmed
        - utxo
        - received
        - txs
      properties:
        address:
          type: string
        confirmed:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Sum of confirmed unspent output values.
        unconfirmed:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Sum of unconfirmed unspent output values.
        utxo:
          description: Total number of unspent outputs.
          type: integer
          format: int64
        received:
          description: Total received by this address including spent.
          type: integer
          format: int64
        txs:
          description: Number of transactions affecting this address.
          type: integer
          format: int64

    Unspent:
      type: object
      description: Information about unspent output.
      required:
        - address
        - block
        - txid
        - index
        - pkscript
        - value
      properties:
        address:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        block:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlockRef'
        txid:
          type: string
        index:
          type: integer
        pkscript:
          type: string
        value:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Value in satoshi.

    BlockData:
      type: object
      required:
        - hash
        - height
        - mainchain
        - previous
        - time
        - version
        - bits
        - nonce
        - size
        - tx
        - merkle
        - subsidy
        - fees
        - outputs
        - work
      properties:
        hash:
          type: string
        size:
          type: integer
          description: >-
            Raw size of a block, including witness data. This is not the virtual
            size and does not compute segwit discounts.
        height:
          type: integer
        mainchain:
          type: boolean
          description: This block is part of the main chain.
        previous:
          type: string
        time:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        bits:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        nonce:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        tx:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        merkle:
          type: string
        subsidy:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Total block subsidy in satoshi.
        fees:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Total transaction fees in satoshi.
        outputs:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          description: Total outputs from this block, including spent.
        weight:
          type: integer
          description: Segwit block weight. Only on segwit networks.
        work:
          type: integer
          description: Accumulated proof-of-work.

    Input:
      type: object
      required:
        - coinbase
        - txid
        - output
        - sigscript
        - sequence
        - pkscript
        - witness
        - value
        - address
      properties:
        coinbase:
          type: boolean
        txid:
          type: string
        output:
          type: integer
        sigscript:
          type: string
        value:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          nullable: true
        sequence:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        address:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        pkscript:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        witness:
          description: Witness Data if applies.
          type: array
          items:
            type: string

    Spender:
      type: object
      description: Reference to a transaction input.
      required:
        - txid
        - input
      properties:
        txid:
          type: string
        input:
          type: integer

    Output:
      type: object
      description: Transactiotn output data.
      required:
        - address
        - pkscript
        - value
        - spent
      properties:
        address:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        pkscript:
          type: string
        value:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        spent:
          type: boolean
        spender:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Spender'

    Transaction:
      type: object
      description: Detailed transaction information.
      required:
        - txid
        - size
        - version
        - locktime
        - fee
        - inputs
        - outputs
        - block
        - deleted
        - time
        - rbf
        - weight
      properties:
        txid:
          type: string
        size:
          type: integer
          description: >-
            Raw transaction size including witness data but excluding segwit
            discount calculations.
        version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        locktime:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        fee:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        inputs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Input'
        outputs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Output'
        block:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BlockRef'
        deleted:
          type: boolean
          description: This transaction is no longer valid.
        time:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        rbf:
          type: boolean
          description: Vulnerable to replace-by-fee.
        weight:
          type: integer
          description: Segwit transaction weight.

    Event:
      type: object
      required:
        - type
        - id
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - tx
            - block
        id:
          type: string
          description: Block or transaction hash

    Peer:
      type: object
      required:
        - useragent
        - address
        - version
        - services
        - relay
      properties:
        useragent:
          type: string
        address:
          type: string
        version:
          type: integer
        services:
          type: string
        relay:
          type: boolean
          description: This peer will relay transactions.

    BlockHealth:
      type: object
      required:
        - headers
        - blocks
        - diff
        - max
        - ok
      properties:
        headers:
          type: integer
        blocks:
          type: integer
        diff:
          type: integer
        max:
          type: integer
        ok:
          type: boolean

    TimeHealth:
      type: object
      required:
        - age
        - max
        - ok
      properties:
        age:
          type: integer
        max:
          type: integer
        ok:
          type: boolean

    CountHealth:

      required:

        - min
        - ok
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
        min:
          type: integer
        ok:
          type: boolean

    MaxHealth:
      type: object
      required:

        - max
        - ok
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
        max:
          type: integer
        ok:
          type: boolean

    HealthCheck:

      required:

    Error:

        total_received:

    BinfoBlockInfo:

    BinfoInfo:

    BinfoXPubBalance:

    BinfoAddrBalance:

    BinfoRawAddr:

    BinfoMultiAddr:

    BinfoTxInput:

    BinfoSpender:

    BinfoHeader:

    BinfoBlock:

        prev_block:

        mrkl_root:
          type: string
        time:
          type: integer
        bits:
          type: integer
        next_block:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        fee:
          type: integer

        nonce:
          type: integer
        n_tx:

        size:

        block_index:

        main_chain:

        height:

    BinfoHistory:

        value_then:

        value_now:

        exchange_rate_then:

    BinfoTx:

        - inputs
        - out
      properties:
        hash:

        ver:

        vin_sz:
          type: integer
        vout_sz:
          type: integer
        size:
          type: integer
        weight:

        fee:

        relayed_by:

        lock_time:
          type: integer
        tx_index:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BinfoTxId'
        double_spend:
          type: boolean
        time:
          type: integer
        block_index:
          type: integer
        block_height:
          type: integer
        inputs:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BinfoTxInput'
        out:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/BinfoTxOutput'
        result:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        balance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        rbf:
          type: boolean

    BinfoUnspent:
      type: object

        - tx_hash
        - tx_output_n

        - tx_index
      properties:

          type: string
        tx_hash:
          type: string
        tx_output_n:

        script:
          type: string
        value:

          format: int64
        value_hex:

        confirmations:

          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BinfoTxId'

    BinfoBalanceReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        active:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ
        activeP2SH:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        activeBech32:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        cashaddr:
          type: boolean
          example: true

    BinfoHistoryReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        active:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ
        activeP2SH:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        activeBech32:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        currency:
          type: string
          example: eur
        start:
          type: string
          example: 20-10-2020
        end:
          type: string
          example: 09-04-2021

    BinfoMultiAddrReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        active:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ
        activeP2SH:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        activeBech32:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        onlyShow:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        n:
          type: integer
          example: 2
        offset:
          type: integer
          example: 5
        noCompact:
          type: boolean
          example: false
        currency:
          type: string
          example: eur
        cashaddr:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        txidindex:
          type: boolean
          example: true
        filter:
          type: integer
          enum: [0,1,2,3,5,7]
          example: 5

    BinfoUnspentReq:
      type: object
      properties:
        active:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ
        activeP2SH:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        activeBech32:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        onlyShow:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        limit:
          type: integer
          example: 2
        confirmations:
          type: integer
          example: 6

  parameters:

    pubKeyParam:
      name: pubkey
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        example: 027eb504988cbc043dd4c9fac51685d68718a24d7f9f1d4c07b9f8c3d04327794c

    addressParam:
      name: address
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      example: qqmaqu9nceck5ct5pqrjy4ulhhw66wdlkv2s7f2l9u

    hashParam:
      name: hash
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      example: 37d070b3c6716a6174080722579fbdddad39bfb3

    addressesParam:
      name: addresses
      in: query
      explode: false
      required: true
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        example:
          - qqmaqu9nceck5ct5pqrjy4ulhhw66wdlkv2s7f2l9u
          - qql2wpu4fa36yf07gcc8q80sjfxfaq66xssezyukg2

    limitParam:
      name: limit
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: Maximum number of entries to return.

    heightParam:
      name: height
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        oneOf:
          - type: integer
          - type: string
      description: |
        * If a block height is specified, only entities confirmed at or below
          that height will be returned.

        * If a block hash is specified, only entities confirmed at or below that
          block's height will be returned. No filtering will be done if the
          block cannot be found.

        * If a Unix timestamp is specified, find the last block mined at or
          before that time and return entries confirmed up to that block's
          height. No filtering will be done if the block cannot be found.

        * If a transaction hash is specified, only entries at or below that
          transaction's place in the block chain will be returned. No filtering
          will be done if the transaction cannot be found or is not confirmed.

    offsetParam:
      name: offset
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: Skip this many entries at the start of the result set.

    nocacheParam:
      name: nocache
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: boolean
      description: Do not use the cache for this query.

    notxParam:
      name: notx
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: boolean
      description: Do not include transactions other than coinbase.

    blockParam:
      name: block
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        example: 000000000003ba27aa200b1cecaad478d2b00432346c3f1f3986da1afd33e506

    blocksParam:
      name: blocks
      in: query
      explode: false
      required: true
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        example:
          - 000000001aeae195809d120b5d66a39c83eb48792e068f8ea1fea19d84a4278a
          - 000000000845517b31c6820d83f25cff46429bf136a7515fe504116427e60f8e

    blockHeightParam:
      name: height
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
      example: 200

    blockHeightsParam:
      name: heights
      in: query
      explode: false
      required: true
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: integer
        example:
          - 100
          - 200
          - 300

    txidParam:
      name: txid
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        example: 03c16602a41ae7cbc2a25b0d2801fdc3295e2e8ebfb26774030b2f7d538f5568

    timeParam:
      name: time
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 1231753120

    txidsParam:
      name: txids
      in: query
      explode: false
      required: true
      schema:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        example:
          - 03c16602a41ae7cbc2a25b0d2801fdc3295e2e8ebfb26774030b2f7d538f5568
          - 02ea64dfff60b1f215282bbb4b2d729fecc50d81d2d0ef09a60d550a5a69418f

    xpubParam:
      name: xpub
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ

    xpubDerive:
      name: derive
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        enum: [segwit, compat, normal]
      description: |
        * `normal`: derive regular P2PKH addresses.
        * `segwit`: derive segwit P2WPKH addresses.
        * `compat`: derive P2SH-P2WPKH backwards-compatible segwit addresses.

    prettyParam:
      name: pretty
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: boolean
      description: Pretty-print JSON output.

    binfoAddr:
      name: address
      in: path
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      description: >
        Address or extended public key.
      example: qqmaqu9nceck5ct5pqrjy4ulhhw66wdlkv2s7f2l9u

    binfoActive:
      name: active
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
        example: xpub6By8JDaPr5L6oHfgQDc47quD69qH1hTwnFYbuia8paiYxSE9u84KZfYqn6xLMUqxKK3wNpsgP4Kwu1gzXHD5xBxj5HrLposEYL6PwZzpAMZ
      description: >
        Addresses or extended public keys.
        Separate by vertical line `|` or comma `,`.
  
    binfoActiveP2SH:
      name: activeP2SH
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: >
        Extended public keys for P2WPKH-on-P2SH address derivation.
        Separate by vertical line `|` or comma `,`.
  
    binfoActiveBech32:
      name: activeBech32
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: >
        Extended public keys for P2WPKH Bech32 address derivation.
        Separate by vertical line `|` or comma `,`.
  
    binfoOnlyShow:
      name: onlyShow
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: >
        Extended public keys and addresses for computing balances in transactions
        and showing in the address section of the wallet.
        If omitted use all active* addresses.
        Separate by vertical line `|` or comma `,`.

    binfoFilter:
      name: filter
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        enum: [0,1,2,3,5,7]
      description: |
        Filter only these types of transaction with respect to active addresses
        (0 for no filtering):

        1. Only outgoing transactions (sent) (result + fee < 0)
        2. Only incoming transactions (received) (result + fee > 0)
        3. Only internal transfers (result + fee = 0)
        4. No filtering
        5. Only confirmed transactions
        6. No filtering
        7. Only unconfirmed transactions
      example: 5
  
    binfoLimit:
      name: limit
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 2
      description: Only retrieve up to this many items.
  
    binfoCount:
      name: n
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
        example: 2
      description: Only retrieve up to this many items.
  
    binfoOffset:
      name: offset
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: Skip this many items at the beginning.

    binfoConfirmations:
      name: confirmations
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: Only return items with at least this many confirmations.
  
    binfoNoCompact:
      name: noCompact
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
        type: boolean
        example: false
      description: >
        Filter out outputs not going to this wallet on incoming transactions.
  
    binfoCurrency:
      name: currency
      in: query
      required: false
      schema:
